notes.text: sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Rework Comparison Microchart to comply with the specification
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: When the whole line and label does not fit the available container space, hide it
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicrochart: Added of showActualValueInDeltaMode
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicrochart: Small fixes in responsive behavior
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicrochart: Hide ComparisonChartData items correctly when container height is small
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Correct label aligning
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Change height of items proportionally based on current chart width
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Add responsive view to ComparisonMicroChartViewType
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: Width property not taken into account
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Issue with size property changing to auto fixed
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Fix for RTL label alignment
sap.suite.ui.microchart.LineMicroChart: Rework to comply with new responsive behavior and UX guidelines
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChart : Interactiveness of donut chart is lost when rendered in compact density mode.
MicroChart: AriaLabelledBy support in all Microchart types
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Rework to comply with new responsive behavior and UX guidelines
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmarLineMicroChart: Added new control
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ColumnMicroChart: Rework to comply with new responsive behavior and UX guidelines
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartColumnMicroChart: Added new control
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart : Mark the event for components that needs to know if the event was handled by the RadialMicroChart.
ColumnMicroChart: Press event not triggered for Data Columns
